plans.name: PAUG
plans.description:
Pay-As-You-Go users simply pay $5 per hour, prorated for all their riding.

If you choose to use the 'Hold' function on the bike, you will be charged the same $5/hour rate as if you were riding the bike.

plans.name: Yearly
plans.description:
The Yearly membership provides users one hour of free ride time every day of the membership. Additional time is charged at $4 per hour, prorated based on actual usage. 
Memberships renew automatically unless you contact Mountain Rides.

If you choose to use the 'Hold' function on the bike, you will be charged the same $4/hour rate as if you were riding the bike.

plans.name: Monthly
plans.description:
The Monthly membership provides users one hour of free ride time every day of the membership. Additional time is charged at $4 per hour, prorated based on actual usage. 
Memberships renew automatically unless you contact Mountain Rides.

If you choose to use the 'Hold' function on the bike, you will be charged the same $4/hour rate as if you were riding the bike.

plans.name: 4-Day Pass
plans.description:
The Day Pass membership provides users one hour of free ride time every day for four days. Additional time is charged at $4 per hour, prorated based on actual usage. 

If you choose to use the 'Hold' function on the bike, you will be charged the same $4/hour rate as if you were riding the bike.
